name: Failboat x Gex: Chapter 1
description:
Started as an inside joke, mutated into this.

Failboat x Gex : Chapter 1

Take a peek into one of the many Failboat multiverses to see a love story unfold between an awkward Denny's employee and a gecko spy looking to leave his past behind and start a new life in Vermont. Will they be able to find a way into each others heart? Download today to find out...

Slice of life. Humor. Love. Drama... This visual novel has it all...

(BY THE WAY JUST TO CLARIFY EVERYBODY WHO WORKED ON THIS GAME DOES NOT ACTUALLY SHIP FAILBOAT WITH GEX.)

Project Organizer, Writer, Coder, Menu Music, Video Editor :

BagelBandit087

Wincar Sprites, Rooftop Art, Failboat Bed Art :

Lunaticsol

Failboat Sprites, Eyea Sprites, Hand Holding Art :

Zekk0Kat

Gex Sprites :

Abtq

Erica Sprites :

Vercities

Opening Music :

Anamanaguchi

Failboat and Wincar's Apartment Music, Denny's Music, Hot Topic Music :

MusicByPedro

TNT Town Music :

Martin Gauffin

Gex's Room Music, Ending Cutscene Footage :

Crystal Dynamics

Café Music : 

Nintendo

Ringtone Music :

Verison

Credits Music :

Nevermind12

REVIEWS FROM SATISFIED PLAYERS :

Failboat x Gex: Chapter 1 is a fantastic experience, filled with LOVE, DRAMA and GECKOS. 

Honestly, this is a game I will remember to my death bed. With unforgettable, hard-hitting lines, the Failboat x Gex Visual Novel has earned its place in the legendary tier of storytelling games. 

Never before has a game like this encapsulated the viewer like it has I, and I can now only think of Failboat x Gex, my life is Failboat x Gex, Failboat x Gex lives in my dreams, and my nightmares. I can't begin the day without playing the entirety of Failboat x Gex: Chapter 1, I only hunger for more of this human/gecko drama.

Highly recommend!

From : Squilly

If you're looking for a visual novel that will remain within the corners of your mind for the rest of your days, then this is the game for YOU. 

Failboat x Gex: Chapter 1 is a visual novel like no other. This story of star-crossed lovers is so moving, so impactful, it could rival Shakespeare's very own Romeo and Juliet. From a trip to TNT town, to cafe dates, this visual novel has it all.

Fantastic visuals, beautiful music, handsome geckos....truly this game has it all. I, for one, await the rest of this thrilling series. 

I was definitely not convinced to write this. This is all 100% my honest, unbiased review .

From : SketchySkittles

Failboat x Gex is a masterpiece that shatters all expectations. Clearly an unsurmountable visual novel that will be passed down in history.

Before first playing it I thought Gex was cool, and  after playing it I thought Gex was cool. It's not only an amazing visual novel, but builds off others work and surpasses them. The writing outshines all other visuals novels in fact, you should delete every visual novel you own right now. Failboat x Gex cannot be compared. 

Ever since chapter 1's release there has been nothing that could match this level of storytelling. In fact I have a laptop only for Failboat x Gex anticipating the day chapter 2 releases. These are characters you can empathize with, the visuals and music make it an emotional rollercoaster. The only thing I want is for chapter 2 to come out faster.

From : Scrubz

The amount of time it took for someone to make a Failboat x Gex game is absolutely infuriating but it is finally here. The ship of Failboat and Gex is obviously the most popular in the community and generally a fan favorite, this game captures it perfectly. The emotion portrayed with each line is so raw it's practically tear jerking. Especially when Wincar gets upset at Failboat for being absent for one night, you can really tell that Wincar has horrendous abandonment issues. The immaculate Chad energy radiating off Gex is while accurate, also incredibly overwhelming. It's no wonder he trapped Failboat in his grasp within 3 days. 

From : Mint
